"{""time"":1744276436946,""blocks"":[{""id"":""MfEfNTp4jQ"",""type"":""header"",""data"":{""text"":""見どころ満載のオープニング映像が公開！"",""level"":2,""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""n0RdNf8gO8"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_01.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""tpM450eVbV"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""KKAVLVUjWj"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""2025年4月6日（日）より放送がスタートしたTVアニメ『ウィッチウォッチ』のオープニング映像が公開されました。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""x4aPRjsm_g"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""物語の幕開けは、主人公の魔女・ニコが魔法をかけるシーンから。しかし、うっかり失敗してしまい、家が大爆発！"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""TgmufUk4km"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""そんなドタバタの始まりも、頼れる相棒・モリヒトがすかさずお姫様抱っこでニコを救い、ふたりのにぎやかな日常がスタートします。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""TQuN_YQrld"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""映像の中では、タイトルの「WITCH WATCH」がシーンごとにキュートにアレンジされながら登場。モリヒトが仲間たちに勉強を教える姿や、驚くほどの速さで動くカンシ、眠るネムの背後に不穏な影が現れる場面など、“ハッピーでちょっぴり不思議”な日常が、魔法のようにポップで明るく描かれています。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""LoLgGrxU8s"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""一方で、後半は物語の緊張感がぐっと増す展開に。険しい表情を浮かべるモリヒトやカンシ、そして何かを見据えるように睨みつける人物の姿が描かれ、彼らに迫る危機を予感させます。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""qSlhmi4mQK"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""さらに、今後の物語の鍵を握るキャラクターも一瞬だけ登場するなど、細部まで目が離せない仕掛けが満載。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""DoGgD55PTT"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""まさに“コマ送りで見たくなる”ような魔法の詰まったオープニング映像。ポップな世界観と、ほんのりダークなスパイスが絶妙に混ざり合った『ウィッチウォッチ』の魅力が、ぎゅっと詰まっています。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""Nsh19ftphl"",""type"":""embed"",""data"":{""service"":""youtube"",""source"":""https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a_NB6QkfzAM"",""embed"":""https://www.youtube.com/embed/a_NB6QkfzAM"",""width"":580,""height"":320,""caption"":""""}},{""id"":""QtDHUi3IaX"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_02.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""jg-SuDNPma"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""x3v4beSoo0"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_03.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""iWITEoSvE_"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""rPZOKpIvzn"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_04.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""1j34VXh_ye"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""SVwIb1JjhI"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_05.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""7yLbPaMkrr"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""aZCi_iOwp3"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_06.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""2q98UGWap1"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""8jPf9Aigwh"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250407_anime_witchwatch_op_07.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""G77FwIfsKk"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）篠原健太／集英社・ウィッチウォッチ製作委員会・MBS"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""R9PVpbO4eH"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""
＼2025年4月期放送のアニメ、なに観る？【アンケート】／"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""hQ_9IJBvpU"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/アンケートバナー.png""},""linkUrl"":""https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSckKjwiZIv84ocz5alGLxsW_2jyanUHiVFriG--WIu8NUSPRQ/viewform""}}],""version"":""2.30.2""}"

"{""time"":1742885942208,""blocks"":[{""id"":""YOymACMNFz"",""type"":""header"",""data"":{""text"":""アニメ『mono』ABEMAでWEB最速配信決定！"",""level"":2,""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""6hT33kme7a"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250319_anime_mono_abema_01.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""q_AX8KKHp4"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）ABEMA（C）あfろ／芳文社・アニプレックス・ソワネ"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""OWTO3iSKGq"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""『ゆるキャン△』のあfろ先生が描く、写真と映像をテーマにした、ほのぼの日常コメディ『mono』。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""tSdDcJxpcw"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""山梨県甲府市を舞台に「シネフォト部」の女子高生たちが織りなす穏やかな日常を描く人気作で、2025年4月12日（土）より待望のTVアニメが放送開始となります。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""uodo0W0RvA"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""そんな本作が、このたび「ABEMA」にて地上波同時・WEB最速配信されることが決定しました。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""QtVQw_V_fw"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""4月12日（土）より毎週土曜24：00からABEMAアニメチャンネルにて、最新話の地上波同時無料放送と、WEB最速配信が開始となります。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""aFww-YWTT5"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""美しい風景とともに紡がれる、少女たちの日常と「週末の遊び方」を、ぜひABEMAでお楽しみください。"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""ca3Uz9_UTj"",""type"":""header"",""data"":{""text"":""ABEMA『mono』地上波同時・WEB最速配信"",""level"":3,""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""ykyWglSQRV"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/20250319_anime_mono_abema_02.png""},""linkUrl"":""""}},{""id"":""33VULAjaP9"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""（C）あfろ／芳文社・アニプレックス・ソワネ"",""alignment"":""center""}},{""id"":""dabFYNM5fK"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""地上波同時放送
放送日時：2025年4月12日（土）24：00〜（以降、毎週土曜日24：00より放送）
放送チャンネル：ABEMAアニメチャンネル
番組URL：https://abema.tv/channels/abema-anime/slots/A2AmWh549iLuZh
※放送後、最新話を1週間無料で視聴可能"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""rIlr3aBLR2"",""type"":""paragraph"",""data"":{""text"":""「ABEMAプレミアム」「広告つきABEMAプレミアム」WEB最速配信
配信開始日時：2025年4月12日（土）24：00〜（以降、毎週土曜日24：00より配信）
番組URL：https://abema.tv/video/title/26-240"",""alignment"":""left""}},{""id"":""94vDQmY2MM"",""type"":""image"",""data"":{""withBorder"":false,""withBackground"":false,""stretched"":false,""file"":{""url"":""https://amplify-d3o1re9c1pbamh-ma-atsumediastoragebucketc5-p4a5475byoag.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/public/news/content/image/ap-northeast-1:b5dffbe4-6899-ce5e-432e-5b792c33feb6/abema_premium800.png""},""linkUrl"":""https://t.afi-b.com/visit.php?a=311369K-4380786f&p=U942616h""}}],""version"":""2.30.2""}"
